ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder.orm
Class StringListFlattener

java.lang.Object
  ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder.orm.StringListFlattener

public class StringListFlattener
extends Object

Flattens a list of strings into a single string using a separator char. An escape char is used to protect separator chars appearing within the data. By default, the separator char is a comma and the escape char is the backslash.
